snippet: From ancient artifacts to common everyday accessories, which objects tell the story of New York City?
abstract: Sam Roberts introduces list of 50 objects that could embody the history of New York City, as identified by historians and curators from the New-York Historical Society, the New York Public Library and the American Museum of Natural History, among others; project was inspired by A History of the World in 100 Objects, the British Museum’s BBC radio series and book.
lead_paragraph: From ancient artifacts to common everyday accessories, which objects tell the story of New York City?

headline.main: A History of New York in 50 Objects
headline.print_headline: A History of New York in 50 Objects
